message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe its worth exceeds $150 and I'm confident it could bring significant benefits to you. To start our negotiation, I propose a price of $200 for the product. I look forward to discussing this further with you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for a more affordable option. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your interest in our product. While I respect your budget, I must maintain the integrity of our pricing strategy. Therefore, I would like to counter your offer with a proposal of $175 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on the product while remaining competitive in the market. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget constraints. However, I am still looking for a more affordable option. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $160 for the product. I hope this revised price aligns better with your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a counteroffer of $165 for the product. This price is reflective of the product's value and quality, while also being competitive in the market. I hope this aligns better with your budget and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've given it careful consideration, and I would like to propose a counteroffer of $160 for the product. I hope this revised price is acceptable and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
